### Checklist Before Requesting Review

- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have read [PHILOSOPHY.md](PHILOSOPHY.md) (for consciousness-related changes)
- [ ] My code follows the ethics framework
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented complex code sections
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests proving my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed
- [ ] I have added my contribution to CHANGELOG.md [Unreleased] section
